means: 氮化合，氮饱和，硝化作用

word_mean: 硝化作用：细菌在土壤中将氨氧化为硝酸盐或亚硝酸盐
化能菌将氨化物和氨转化为硝酸根(NO3-)或亚硝酸根(NO2-)离子的过程。

sentence.Network_en: Ammonification, nitrification and nitrogen assimilation in HA - TF are predominant.
sentence.Network_cn: 氨化作用、同化作用及滤池的硝化作用是氮的主要转化形式.

sentence.Network_en: Nitrification is the key to biological wastewater nitrogen removal.
sentence.Network_cn: 硝化作用是废水生物脱氮中的关键.

sentence.Network_en: The application of nitrification accelerator HB - 1 in wastewater treatment plant was introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了硝化促进剂HB -1 在污水处理装置中的应用情况.

means.word_mean: 1. the chemical process in which a nitro group is added to an organic compound (or substituted for another group in an organic compound)
2. the oxidation of ammonium compounds in dead organic material into nitrates and nitrites by soil bacteria (making nitrogen available to plants)
